knowledgeGraph.title: Apple
knowledgeGraph.description: Apple Inc. is an American multinational corporation and technology company headquartered in Cupertino, California, in Silicon Valley. It is best known for its consumer electronics, software, and services.

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What does Apple Inc. mean?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Apple Inc., originally Apple Computer, Inc., is a multinational corporation that creates and markets consumer electronics and attendant computer software, and is a digital distributor of media content. Apple's core product lines are the iPhone smartphone, iPad tablet computer, and the Mac personal computer.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: History of Apple Inc. - Wikipedia

peopleAlsoAsk.question: What does the Inc stand for in Apple?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Inc. is the abbreviation for incorporated. An incorporated company, or corporation, is a separate legal entity from the person or people forming it. Directors and officers purchase shares in the business and have responsibility for its operation.
peopleAlsoAsk.title: like when we write apple inc..what does inc stand here???​ - Brainly.in
